Dear Bill:
The pilot issue of Educational Radio-TV is indeed interesting
and attractive. We certainly wish for you great success in this
new undertaking.
On the other hand, a review of our commitments and current
fields of interest lead to the conclusion that we could not give
serious consideration to a formal proposal which you might make for
support from this Foundation to aid in financing this new publicaÂ¬
tion.
I am not sure at this time whether or not I can attend your
convention. If I am unable to do this, I will be in Washington
sometime during the fall months and hope to visit with you.
Sincerely and with best wishes.
Maurice F. Seay
